member.name: M:Microsoft.Toolkit.Services.MicrosoftTranslator.AzureAuthToken.GetAccessTokenAsync
member.summary: Gets a token for the specified subscription.
member.returns: The encoded JWT token prefixed with the string "Bearer ".
member.remarks: This method uses a cache to limit the number of request to the token service. A fresh token can be re-used during its lifetime of 10 minutes. After a successful request to the token service, this method caches the access token. Subsequent invocations of the method return the cached token for the next 8 minutes. After 8 minutes, a new token is fetched from the token service and the cache is updated.
